component.name: Port Slayer
component.summary: Kill processes and manage system resources with ease

description.p: Port Slayer is a powerful system process manager that helps you monitor, search, and terminate running processes on your system. Built with modern web technologies (Tauri, React, TypeScript) for a fast and responsive user experience.

ul.li: Real-time process monitoring with live status updates
Advanced search and filtering by process name, PID, command, or port
Quick process termination with a single click
Clean, intuitive interface with keyboard shortcuts

description.p: Perfect for developers, system administrators, and power users who need to quickly identify and manage system processes, especially when dealing with stuck applications or port conflicts.
